trans-unit.source: Identifies the window to precede the positioned window in the Z order. This parameter must be a

seg-source.mrk: Identifies the window to precede the positioned window in the Z order.
This parameter must be a

target.mrk: Identifies the window to precede the positioned window in the Z order.
This parameter must be a

trans-unit.source: window handle or one of the following values:

seg-source.mrk: window handle or one of the following values:

target.mrk: window handle or one of the following values:

trans-unit.source: $HWND_BOTTOM - Places the window at the bottom of the Z order

seg-source.mrk: $HWND_BOTTOM - Places the window at the bottom of the Z order

target.mrk: $HWND_BOTTOM - Places the window at the bottom of the Z order

trans-unit.source: $HWND_NOTOPMOST - Places the window above all non-topmost windows

seg-source.mrk: $HWND_NOTOPMOST - Places the window above all non-topmost windows

target.mrk: $HWND_NOTOPMOST - Places the window above all non-topmost windows

trans-unit.source: $HWND_TOP - Places the window at the top of the Z order

target.mrk: $HWND_TOP - Places the window at the top of the Z order

trans-unit.source: $HWND_TOPMOST - Places the window above all non-topmost windows

seg-source.mrk: $HWND_TOPMOST - Places the window above all non-topmost windows

target.mrk: $HWND_TOPMOST - Places the window above all non-topmost windows

trans-unit.source: $SWP_DRAWFRAME - Draws a frame around the window

seg-source.mrk: $SWP_DRAWFRAME - Draws a frame around the window

target.mrk: $SWP_DRAWFRAME - Draws a frame around the window

trans-unit.source: $SWP_FRAMECHANGED - Sends a $WM_NCCALCSIZE message to the window, even if the window's size is not changed

seg-source.mrk: $SWP_FRAMECHANGED - Sends a $WM_NCCALCSIZE message to the window, even if the window's size is not changed

target.mrk: $SWP_FRAMECHANGED - Sends a $WM_NCCALCSIZE message to the window, even if the window's size is not changed

trans-unit.source: $SWP_HIDEWINDOW - Hides the window

target.mrk: $SWP_HIDEWINDOW - Hides the window

trans-unit.source: $SWP_NOACTIVATE - Does not activate the window

target.mrk: $SWP_NOACTIVATE - Does not activate the window

trans-unit.source: $SWP_NOCOPYBITS - Discards the entire contents of the client area

target.mrk: $SWP_NOCOPYBITS - Discards the entire contents of the client area

trans-unit.source: $SWP_NOMOVE - Retains the current position

target.mrk: $SWP_NOMOVE - Retains the current position

trans-unit.source: $SWP_NOOWNERZORDER - Does not change the owner window's position in the Z order

target.mrk: $SWP_NOREDRAW - Does not redraw changes

trans-unit.source: $SWP_NOREPOSITION - Same as the $SWP_NOOWNERZORDER flag

target.mrk: $SWP_NOREPOSITION - Same as the $SWP_NOOWNERZORDER flag

trans-unit.source: $SWP_NOSENDCHANGING - Prevents the window from receiving $WM_WINDOWPOSCHANGING

target.mrk: $SWP_NOSENDCHANGING - Prevents the window from receiving $WM_WINDOWPOSCHANGING
